thread.title: Excella Consulting's Agile Experts To Speak at AgileDC
thread.title_full: Excella Consulting's Agile Experts To Speak at AgileDC

author: admin
title: Excella Consulting's Agile Experts To Speak at AgileDC
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 10:15 AM   Excella Consulting 
ARLINGTON, Va., Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Excella Consulting, an award-winning Agile technology consulting firm, is excited to announce that three of its thought leaders will present at the AgileDC conference later this month. The conference takes place on Monday, October 26 at the Kellogg Conference Center at Gallaudet University. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20130313/PH76405LOGO 
AgileDC is the largest Agile community organized event in the Washington DC metro area. The event features local experts from government and industry, and covers a broad range of topics such as Lean principles and practices, Agile engineering practices, DevOps, and digital services transformation. AgileDC is organized by volunteers from the local technology community and donates all proceeds to charity. 
"We are thrilled to sponsor the event for the fifth year in a row," says Tony Solomita, Excella's Agile Practice Lead. "Our thought leaders have experience teaching and implementing Agile principles and practices at organizations of all sizes, and we are excited to share our knowledge with the community." 
Excella's speakers include Richard Cheng, Fadi Stephan and Ken Furlong, who teach and speak frequently in DC and around the country about Agile software development. Their conference topics include: -- Situational Retrospectives - One Size Does Not Fit All (Richard Cheng) -- Lean Discovery, Agile Delivery and the DevOps Mindset (Fadi Stephan) -- How to Organize Multi-Team Programs (Ken Furlong) 
To learn more and register for AgileDC, visit: http://agiledc.org/ 
About Excella Consulting Excella Consulting is an IT consulting firm serving federal, commercial, and non-profit clients in the Washington D.C. area. Our consultants specialize in software development, data and analytics, program management, and DevOps. Excella's expertise is rooted in Agile principles and practices, and exceptional business analysis methods. We help business leaders define and execute the right strategies to make the most of their IT investments. Visit www.excella.com for more information and career opportunities.
